portfolio.name: CIS Tech Web Content Management System
portfolio.short_intro: CIS Tech Ltd. is a technology consulting and software development company based in Bangladesh. They provide a wide range of services, including web and mobile application development, software testing, and IT consulting. Their website, cistechltd.com, offers information about their services, portfolio, and company culture.

portfolio.name: Yotta Small & Medium Enterprise Application
portfolio.short_intro:
Yotta SME is a product of CIS Tech Ltd. It's an all-in-one cloud-based software solution for small and medium-sized businesses. It offers accounting, inventory, procurements, POS, asset management, customer management, product management, and human resource management to manage any business.
That processes all your tasks over smartphones, tablets, laptops, and any platform. It's Android and iOS app allows you to monitor your stock, accounts, and all of your business processes from all over the world.
It serves businesses like restaurants, accounting firms, retail stores, super shops, mobile-shop, chemical-shop, and many more ways it can be used.

portfolio.name: Yotta ERP SaaS Website
portfolio.short_intro: YOTTA ERP is a product of CIS TECH LTD. (Chain of Innovative Solutions & Technology Limited). It provides custom software development services based on Software as a service(SaaS) and Software as a Product(SaaP). CIS started its' journey in 2012 and was re-inaugurated in Jan 2022. CIS transforms businesses with affordable, efficient, and adaptable digital solutions that satisfy the needs of today and unlocks the opportunities for tomorrow. Based on many years of experience, we know that every business has a different software and hardware environment. We specialize in scalable and reliable software solutions for any computing system, operating system, browser, and device. We involve deep industry expertise and the latest IT advancements to deliver custom solutions and products for individuals, startups, and small to medium businesses. CIS has the ideology to leave a mark in the field of Innovation and technology as a well-established company.

My role as a Front-End Developer involved building responsive user interfaces and integrating APIs.

portfolio.name: Yotta SME SaaS Website
portfolio.short_intro: A comprehensive SaaS platform built for small and medium-sized enterprises using Laravel and PHP. As a Full-Stack Developer, I was responsible for both back-end functionality and front-end design, ensuring smooth operation and user experience.

portfolio.short_intro: An iOS financial application developed using Swift and SwiftUI, focusing on managing financial assets and accounts. As an iOS Developer, I worked on implementing the UI, managing local storage with CoreData, and integrating APIs.

portfolio.short_intro: A web-based hotel management system built with PHP and MySQL for handling booking, guest management, and invoicing processes. As a Junior Software Developer, I contributed to both back-end logic and front-end design, improving system efficiency.

portfolio.name: Optimization of Energy Usage for Edifice Electrical Appliances Using IoT.
portfolio.short_intro:
The inefficiency of energy usage at various institutes is rising and it is an increasing concern in urban areas. The purpose of this project is to introduce a new platform that facilitates the optimization of energy usage for electrical appliances of a home or office with the use of a number of integrated IoT devices to ensure an interactive, user-friendly, and intelligent operation for viewing and controlling the power consumption of the home or office. The proposed platform includes a number of room with various sensors connected close to the equipment loads which will detect and transfer the data to a room energy management open source software that allows sensing and control of AC loads at a small or a medium-sized home or commercial building. Finally, the purpose would be to extract the energy consumption data from the energy meter and transfer it onto a database that will show the user how much of the energy is being consumed throughout the process. Afterward, the user can improve energy efficiency, reduce energy consumption, and foster demand response implementation of power utilities. 
Possible challenges during the implementation of the hardware will be as follows. Firstly, the collection of input from multiple loads using less number of sensors and lastly, the collection of data from an energy meter and entering these data into the database for monitoring and controlling purposes. The first challenge can be solved by the use of a set of sensors to detect input from a number of loads and then, sending the signal onto a Raspberry Pi which detects and transfers the data onto the database for monitoring and controlling of these loads. Load controlling will use a relay connected to Raspberry Pi that can control the 220V loads using 5V only. After we obtain the algorithm for an energy meter, we will use it onto our software for the collection of the data onto our database. Thus, the user can get all the data sources that could allow him to effectively control the energy usage of the room appliances.
Further study is required for the development of this project because with the development of energy meters throughout the years, the algorithms might change and the collection procedure might vary. Therefore, we need a competent way to collect the data from any energy meter available. In the initial phase the proposed system will work without the use of smart appliance. However, in the future, we shall be using smart appliances to a much greater extent to make our system more efficient.
In conclusion, we will design and develop a smart system to upgrade our energy usage of electrical appliances in our everyday lives that not only saves energy but also allows us to smartly operate our home or office and will also reduce energy costs.

portfolio.name: Automated Garden Watering System
portfolio.short_intro: An IoT-based automated garden watering system using Arduino and sensors to manage water flow for plants. This system utilizes a motor and timer to automate watering schedules, improving garden maintenance efficiency.

portfolio.name: Poultry Farm Management System
portfolio.short_intro: A comprehensive web-based management system for poultry farms, developed using PHP and Laravel. As a Full-Stack Support Developer, I contributed to both back-end and front-end functionality, focusing on improving user experience and system reliability.

portfolio.name: Smart Home system
portfolio.short_intro: Smart Home System is an IoT platform that integrates EasyEDA, ESP32, and Flutter to create a seamless home automation experience. Developed over 3 months, this project leverages Embedded C for device control, offering advanced functionality for home applications.

portfolio.name: Internet of things (IOT) Do & Try
portfolio.short_intro: A hands-on IoT project exploring various hardware and software integrations including Raspberry Pi, Arduino, ESP32, and sensors for developing innovative IoT solutions.
